file_content.text: Colonel Bartaph is waiting for you back at the main Republic base.
Whew--that was cutting it close. We didn't know you were here until Master Satele informed Colonel Bartaph.
The officer in charge of Belsavis. She's brought a battalion of soldiers to regain control of the prison.
Now that the power core is secure, the colonel wants to meet with you about a Zabrak named Pak Taldine.
With Krannus out of the way, I think I can spare a few moments.
I'll go meet the colonel now.
Did she give you any details?
I just know she wants to speak in person. Must be important.
It would be easier if she just contacted me on my holo.
I get the feeling it's important. She likes to handle those things face-to-face.
We'll stay and guard the power core. The colonel is waiting for you at the main Republic base.
